blog.name: ode-to-an-inkwell
blog.title: You Can’t Frighten Me
blog.description:
Lit major | Writer | House Stark loyalist🐺

AO3: ode_to_an_inkwell

summary:
And if someone has talked about it just @ them so they can roast me.
But...since we’ve been comparing the VO dialogue with the...
body:
Not sure if it’s been mentioned

And if someone has talked about it just @ them so they can roast me.

But…since we’ve been comparing the VO dialogue with the images they are playing over, I thought it interesting what Arya says when they show this Varys moment:

“He’s got many faces.” In context, she’s speaking of death/the many faced god. But as this line is spoken in its entirety as the camera focuses on Varys’ face, I think it reasonable to link the line to our favorite secret merman.

The notion of having many faces, when applied to a person, implies either a multifaceted personality or (more likely here) refers to someone possessing a two-faced nature. Varys has been accused of this before by D. We know in S7 she confronted him about advising her father whilst also aiding in his downfall. And if anyone on her team would jump ship, wouldn’t it be the person known for gravitating toward the better option?

Varys hasn’t seen Sansa since she was a little girl, and I don’t remember him speaking much with her aside from maybe a stray line or two of dialogue. Arya’s line makes me believe Varys might be two-faced this season; perhaps he will speak complacencies to one ruler whilst confiding in and serving another, more suitable ruler. Someone with the right family name, who can intimidate the high lords and inspire the people…

summary:
A modern tale  
“Stop pitting women against each other OMGAAAH” she commented on the correctly tagged post, made for a show...
body:
A modern tale

“Stop pitting women against each other OMGAAAH” she commented on the correctly tagged post, made for a show where everyone is against each other. With a click of the mouse she felt immensely empowered.

She then went and wrote a full length meta on how Dany will crush Cersei with her dragons and burn her alive, and how Sansa will turn on her family to finish the work her evil mother Catelyn started.

summary: Some instinct made her lift her hand and cup his cheek with her fingers. The room was too dark for her to see him, but she could...
caption: Some instinct made her lift her hand and cup his cheek with her fingers. The room was too dark for her to see him, but she could feel the stickiness of the blood, and a wetness that was not blood. “Little bird,” he said once more, his voice raw and harsh as steel on stone. Then he rose from the bed. Sansa heard cloth ripping, followed by the softer sound of retreating footsteps.

The room was too dark for her to see him, but she could feel the stickiness of the blood, and a wetness that was not blood. “Little bird,” he said once more, his voice raw and harsh as steel on stone. Then he rose from the bed. Sansa heard cloth ripping, followed by the softer sound of retreating footsteps.

Then he rose from the bed. Sansa heard cloth ripping, followed by the softer sound of retreating footsteps.

blog.name: theredkingofthenorth
blog.title: Robb Stark
blog.description: Private. 21. Majoring in World History. Teacher aide in Phys education. Part of everlyhqs.

summary: @xolvidados Robb had been called out on a small apartment fire not far from his station. It wasn’t a huge one, probably a tenant...
body:
@xolvidados

Robb had been called out on a small apartment fire not far from his station. It wasn’t a huge one, probably a tenant just burning something on their stove, but it was still taken seriously. His team arrived in seconds, evacuating the building and make sure everyone was out safely. Even the cat was in good hands, Robb grabbing the feline last as the fire was put out by his partners. Standing outside in the sun, car meowing in his arms, he caught glimpse of a familiar face, his eyes drawn to her almost immediately. “Sansa?” His tone was unsure, not knowing his sister even lived in this area. And wasn’t she destined to marry some Lannister? Wait, was he making that up? Robb turned to face her more, eyebrows drawn together. “Sansa Stark?”

blog.name: jonsa101
blog.title: Jonsa101
blog.description: #Jonsa and #Sharpwin Meta Writer. Pop Culture Obsessed. Lover of Street Style.

summary:
Gif credit @dailylenaheadey 
Ok so I’m really happy that I finally have time to write this meta. It’s honestly been such a...
body:
The GOT Season 8 Trailer; A Revelation of Who These Characters Really Are!

Gif credit @dailylenaheadey

Ok so I’m really happy that I finally have time to write this meta. It’s honestly been such a wonderful hectic two weeks for me. To recap, I got an incredible job where I literally get paid to be a content creator, I got to see Michelle Obama in person, and now the GOT trailer just dropped! It’s like the cherry on top of everything! ❤️

Anyway, since I’ve been a little preoccupied I wasn’t able to flood the tags with my EXTRA AF hype like I usually do when things drop so I thought I would make a meta about some of my quick thoughts on the trailer. So without further ado, let’s get into it!

I know a lot of you were not impressed by this new trailer but for me I thought it was beautiful! The trailer had some of the most gorgeous shots I’ve seen on the show thus far. Some of my favorite shots were Arya running in utter fear, Jon in front of the heart tree, Sansa seeing Dany’s dragons for the first time and even Drogon and Rhaegel flying over the beautiful landscape of the North. Out of all the clips shown the one of Cersei above is BY FAR my favorite. When I saw this shot she literally took my breath away. This one clip is so painstakingly tragic and beautiful all at the same time. It moved me to the point that it almost made me want to switch sides completely and root for my girl to win it all!

Quick side note:

For 👏🏾 the 👏🏾 love 👏🏾 of 👏🏾 all 👏🏾that 👏🏾 is 👏🏾 good 👏🏾 in 👏🏾 the 👏🏾 world 👏🏾 let 👏🏾 Lena 👏🏾 Headey 👏🏾 win 👏🏾 her 👏🏾 Emmy!!

That is all! Moving on, I genuinely think that this scene pretty much embodies everything you need to know about season 8. Let me explain. The trailer we were given was pretty much the opposite of the promotion that we’ve had for the final season. For a worldwide campaign that’s literally hashtaged #ForTheThrone there were practically no hints of any relational/political conflicts to come in this trailer. If anything the trailer in itself is pretty much cut and dry and is seemingly as predictable as they come. (WWs vs Humanity and the “Good Guys” vs Cersei.) But yet the beauty of this trailer is that they put in these hidden gems such as this Cersei scene above that really makes you reevaluate the TYPE OF STORY they are trying to tell. It’s wonderfully deceptive but the gems are there!

To me, I clearly see a running theme of these characters facing the reality of who they are and what truly matters to them. The Cersei scene above completely embodies that. Is that not the face of a women realizing the depth of her loss, pain, and loneliness and what it’s made her become? You can see this same theme running in Arya, Jaimie and Missandei and Grey Worm’s clips as well.

Arya’s inner struggle of being No One or returning to the core of who she was. Jaimie on the path of redemption desperatley trying to restore his name. Missandei and Greyworm dedicated to Daenerys but clearly devoted to each other above all else. These are just a handful of the clips where this theme is present.

What’s extremely noteable is that as we get a hint into some of the revelation/journeys these other characters will make/face we are completely shut out from some of the most important characters journeys this season. Except for some close up shots of Jon, Dany, Tyrion and Sansa’s facial expressions we really have no indication of their inner struggles, what really matters to them and who they are and that means a lot!!!!!!!!!!

We get no clue about their emotional or political journeys other than what the story has led us to believe and expect! This is so so so HUGE!! I can’t emphasize that enough and this means that without a doubt there are MAJOR TWISTS TO COME!! At the end of the day, this is a story that is absolutely about family, and the emotional and political relationships these characters have to face!

So with that I end with this. For those of you who are fretting, I promise you the basic story that you fear is not happening!! It’s not! No matter what you read. Trust the narrative. Note the absence of a semblance of a hint of your fave characters upcoming journeys. All of this is purposeful! All of this is done with great intention to hide the storylines that will effectively change everything we thought and believed about the final season of Game of Thrones.

Arya’s inner struggle of being No One or returning to the core of who she was. Jaimie on the path of redemption desperatley trying to restore his name. Missandei and Greyworm dedicated to Daenerys but clearly devoted to each other above all else. These are just a handful of the clips where this theme is present.

What’s extremely noteable is that as we get a hint into some of the revelation/journeys these other characters will make/face we are completely shut out from some of the most important characters journeys this season. Except for some close up shots of Jon, Dany, Tyrion and Sansa’s facial expressions we really have no indication of their inner struggles, what really matters to them and who they are and that means a lot!!!!!!!!!!

We get no clue about their emotional or political journeys other than what the story has led us to believe and expect! This is so so so HUGE!! I can’t emphasize that enough and this means that without a doubt there are MAJOR TWISTS TO COME!! At the end of the day, this is a story that is absolutely about family, and the emotional and political relationships these characters have to face!

So with that I end with this. For those of you who are fretting, I promise you the basic story that you fear is not happening!! It’s not! No matter what you read. Trust the narrative. Note the absence of a semblance of a hint of your fave characters upcoming journeys. All of this is purposeful! All of this is done with great intention to hide the storylines that will effectively change everything we thought and believed about the final season of Game of Thrones.

summary: Aegon and Arianne are likely to get married but is not Sansa a better bachelorette than Arianne ? Sansa is the sister of the...
question: Aegon and Arianne are likely to get married but is not Sansa a better bachelorette than Arianne ? Sansa is the sister of the rightful lord of Winterfell, niece of the rightful lord of Riverrun, cousin of the lord of Eyrie and when Walder and so will get killed by Catelyn, her cousin could have a claim for Twins as well. She's the best to marry for a pretender.
answer:
First of all Arianne is the Prince of Dorne’s heir so jot that down. Second of all Winterfell, Riverrun and the Eyrie are all occupied so it doesn’t matter what Sansa’s connections are, she can’t utilise them. Third of all Sansa is a fugitive in hiding. Arianne is none of those things, in fact Jon Connington reached out to her family not Sansa’s.

I love Sansa but I’m tired of y’all acting like Arianne (and by extension Dorne) is beneath her especially with GRRM’s obvious preference for the (white) Starks.

body:
https://bookriot.com/2019/03/04/sansa-stark-for-the-iron-throne/

Great article on Book Riot about Sansa Stark, why she’s best for the throne, and comparisons to Elizabeth I.

Only part I didn’t like was about Jon, because it broke my Jonsa heart.

tags: and thank you for the ask
summary: Ahhh Are you continuing the Janson x Sansa story? :D
question: Ahhh Are you continuing the Janson x Sansa story? :D
answer:
The long and short answer is, Yes!

(I won’t go into too much, Summer was brutal and I’m glad it’s finally over!)

I’ve been writing when I can and the short prompt I wrote awhile ago is now close to three chapters, while I’ve been working on about six other (new) projects. (One of which, is a Janson x Sansa smutty one-shot.) It might be slow but I’ll always finish what I said I’d write.
